div.style: overflow-x: auto;overflow-y:auto;max-height:400px; max-width: 100%; border: 1px solid #DDDDDD; border-radius: 5px;

table.style: border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; text-align: left; table-layout: fixed;

th.style: width: 150px; padding: 10px; position: sticky; left: 0; background: #f2f2f2; z-index: 2; border-right: 2px solid #ddd;
